verses.esv: 5 “Blessed are the meek, for they shall inherit the earth.
verses.kjv: 5 Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.
verses.niv: 5 Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.

verses.esv: 2 to speak evil of no one, to avoid quarreling, to be gentle, and to show perfect courtesy toward all people.
verses.kjv: 2 To speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.
verses.niv: 2 to slander no one, to be peaceable and considerate, and to show true humility toward all men.

verses.esv:
11   But the meek shall inherit the land
    and delight themselves in abundant peace.
verses.kjv: 11 But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
verses.niv: 11 But the meek will inherit the land and enjoy great peace.

verses.esv:
9   He leads the humble in what is right,
    and teaches the humble his way.
verses.kjv: 9 The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
verses.niv: 9 He guides the humble in what is right and teaches them his way.

verses.esv: 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
verses.kjv: 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
verses.niv: 29 Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.

verses.esv: 13 Who is wise and understanding among you? By his good conduct let him show his works in the meekness of wisdom.
verses.kjv: 13 Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
verses.niv: 13 Who is wise and understanding among you? Let him show it by his good life, by deeds done in the humility that comes from wisdom.

verses.esv: 3 Now the man Moses was very meek, more than all people who were on the face of the earth.
verses.kjv: 3 (Now the man Moses was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face of the earth.)
verses.niv: 3 (Now Moses was a very humble man, more humble than anyone else on the face of the earth.)

verses.esv: 4 but let your adorning be the hidden person of the heart with the imperishable beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which in God’s sight is very precious.
verses.kjv: 4 But let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.
verses.niv: 4 Instead, it should be that of your inner self, the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great worth in God's sight.

verses.esv: 15 but in your hearts honor Christ the Lord as holy, always being prepared to make a defense to anyone who asks you for a reason for the hope that is in you; yet do it with gentleness and respect,
verses.kjv: 15 But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts: and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear:
verses.niv: 15 But in your hearts set apart Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect,

verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

verses.esv: 14 Bless those who persecute you; bless and do not curse them.
verses.kjv: 14 Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.
verses.niv: 14 Bless those who persecute you; bless and do not curse.

verses.esv: 23 gentleness, self-control; against such things there is no law.
verses.kjv: 23 Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
verses.niv: 23 gentleness and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

verses.esv:
3   Seek the LORD, all you humble of the land,
    who do his just commands;
  seek righteousness; seek humility;
    perhaps you may be hidden
    on the day of the anger of the LORD.
verses.kjv: 3 Seek ye the LORD, all ye meek of the earth, which have wrought his judgment; seek righteousness, seek meekness: it may be ye shall be hid in the day of the LORD’S anger.
verses.niv: 3 Seek the LORD, all you humble of the land, you who do what he commands. Seek righteousness, seek humility; perhaps you will be sheltered on the day of the LORD's anger.

verses.esv: 12 Put on then, as God’s chosen ones, holy and beloved, compassionate hearts, kindness, humility, meekness, and patience,
verses.kjv: 12 Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
verses.niv: 12 Therefore, as God's chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.

verses.esv: 6:1 Brothers, if anyone is caught in any transgression, you who are spiritual should restore him in a spirit of gentleness. Keep watch on yourself, lest you too be tempted.
verses.kjv: 1 Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
verses.niv: 1 Brothers, if someone is caught in a sin, you who are spiritual should restore him gently. But watch yourself, or you also may be tempted.

verses.esv: 21 Therefore put away all filthiness and rampant wickedness and receive with meekness the implanted word, which is able to save your souls.
verses.kjv: 21 Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.
verses.niv: 21 Therefore, get rid of all moral filth and the evil that is so prevalent and humbly accept the word planted in you, which can save you.

verses.esv: 10:1 I, Paul, myself entreat you, by the meekness and gentleness of Christ—I who am humble when face to face with you, but bold toward you when I am away!—
verses.kjv: 1 Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence am base among you, but being absent am bold toward you:
verses.niv: 1 By the meekness and gentleness of Christ, I appeal to you--I, Paul, who am "timid" when face to face with you, but "bold" when away!

verses.esv: 2 with all humility and gentleness, with patience, bearing with one another in love,
verses.kjv: 2 With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
verses.niv: 2 Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.

verses.esv: 7 But we were gentle among you, like a nursing mother taking care of her own children.
verses.kjv: 7 But we were gentle among you, even as a nurse cherisheth her children:
verses.niv: 7 As apostles of Christ we could have been a burden to you, but we were gentle among you, like a mother caring for her little children.

verses.esv: 4 And let steadfastness have its full effect, that you may be perfect and complete, lacking in nothing.
verses.kjv: 4 But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
verses.niv: 4 Perseverance must finish its work so that you may be mature and complete, not lacking anything.

verses.esv:
6   The LORD lifts up the humble;
    he casts the wicked to the ground.
verses.kjv: 6 The LORD lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.
verses.niv: 6 The LORD sustains the humble but casts the wicked to the ground.

verses.esv: 17 But the wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, open to reason, full of mercy and good fruits, impartial and sincere.
verses.kjv: 17 But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be intreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.
verses.niv: 17 But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial and sincere.

verses.esv: 11 But as for you, O man of God, flee these things. Pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, steadfastness, gentleness.
verses.kjv: 11 But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.
verses.niv: 11 But you, man of God, flee from all this, and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, endurance and gentleness.

verses.esv: 6 But he gives more grace. Therefore it says, “God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble.” 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you. 8 Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you. Cleanse your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded. 9 Be wretched and mourn and weep. Let your laughter be turned to mourning and your joy to gloom. 10 Humble yourselves before the Lord, and he will exalt you.
verses.kjv: 6 But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble. 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you. 8 Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded. 9 Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness. 10 Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.
verses.niv: 6 But he gives us more grace. That is why Scripture says: "God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble." 7 Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you. 8 Come near to God and he will come near to you. Wash your hands, you sinners, and purify your hearts, you double-minded. 9 Grieve, mourn and wail. Change your laughter to mourning and your joy to gloom. 10 Humble yourselves before the Lord, and he will lift you up.

verses.esv: 24 And the Lord’s servant must not be quarrelsome but kind to everyone, able to teach, patiently enduring evil,
verses.kjv: 24 And the servant of the Lord must not strive; but be gentle unto all men, apt to teach, patient,
verses.niv: 24 And the Lord's servant must not quarrel; instead, he must be kind to everyone, able to teach, not resentful.
